title: Comment on ``Additional analytically exact solutions for three-anyons'' and ``Fermion Ground State of Three Particles in a Harmonic Potential Well and Its Anyon Interpolation''
abstract: The claim put forward in [hep-th/9512051, hep-th/9612244] that the energies of the ``missing'' states of three anyons in a harmonic potential depend linearly on the statistics parameter, is incorrect because the wave functions proposed do not satisfy the anyonic interchange conditions.
